page: CE60125: Numerical Methods In Structural Engineering

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Error in numerical computations; solution of nonlinear equations; solution of linear system of equations; interpolation and polynomial approximation; curve fitting; numerical differentiation and integration; solution of ordinary differential equation (ODE); solution of partial differential equation (PDE); Eigen Values and Eigen Vectors; Error analysis
